channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Homeland Security Email Tells a US Citizen to 'Immediately' Self-Deport
item.description: An email sent by the Department of Homeland Security instructs people in the US on a temporary legal status to leave the country. But who the email ac...

item.title: Could an Amazon driver could be the one who saves your life?

item.title: Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Compact Review: Versatile, Uneven
item.description: The Smart Oven Air Fryer Compact has truly intelligent presets, and a lot of functionality in a wee device. But I wonder about the airflow.

item.title: Is Airplane Mode on Flights Necessary or Outdated? (2025)
item.description: If you don’t, your flight won’t crash, but ignoring airplane mode uses up your battery and annoys the pilot.

item.title: The Best Pixel 9 Cases, Tested and Reviewed (2025)

item.title: Cofertility’s radical model for women: Freeze your eggs for free by donating half of them

item.title: Apple’s ‘Mythic Quest’ is ending with an updated Season 4 finale

item.title: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever’s Safe Superintelligence reportedly valued at $32B

item.title: Asus Vivobook 14 Copilot+ PC Review: A Budget Windows Laptop
item.description: Terrible color accuracy ruins what is an otherwise great budget Windows laptop.
